Welcome to Whispa App's documentation!
===================================

Whispa App is a powerful speech-to-text application using OpenAI's Whisper model.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   usage
   api
   development
   changelog

Features
--------

- Transcription in multiple languages
- Translation capabilities
- Batch processing
- Multiple export formats (TXT, SRT, VTT, JSON)
- GPU acceleration
- Advanced audio processing
- Modern, user-friendly interface
- Dark/Light theme support
- System resource monitoring

Installation
------------

You can install Whispa App in two ways:

1. Using pip::

    pip install whispa-app

2. Using the Windows installer:

   Download the latest installer from our `GitHub releases page <https://github.com/yourusername/whispa-app/releases>`_.

Quick Start
----------

1. Launch the application
2. Click "Browse" to select an audio file
3. Choose a model size (larger = better but slower)
4. Click "Transcribe" to start processing
5. Use "Translate" to convert to another language if needed

For more detailed instructions, see the :doc:`usage` guide.

We welcome contributions! Please see our :doc:`development` guide for details.
